item.title: Talk Report: From JavaEE to AngularJS - Video & Slides
item.description: NetBeans Day Paris, for the first time in France, held on the October 16th, 2015. It was a very nice opportunity to meet NetBeans users and developers in Paris Area. My presentation isÂ a live coding session showing how to make a sample app from scratch on NetBeans, using many trendy technologies and APIs: IDE: NetBeans 8.0.2 Server: Payara Server 4.1.153 Backend: Java EE 7 [JPA 2.1, EJB 3.2, CDI 1.
